original_title: Quero Botar Meu Bloco Na Rua
overview: "Quero Botar Meu Bloco na Rua" is an affective journey through the history of the street carnival blocks in Rio, telling the saga of this popular manifestation that spans the centuries adapting to all sorts of social, political, cultural or economic transformations in Brazil.
title: Quero Botar Meu Bloco Na Rua
